com.wingfoot.wsdl.gen
Class DeploymentDescriptorWriterInstance

java.lang.Object
  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
DeploymentDescriptorWriter
public class DeploymentDescriptorWriterInstance
extends BaseWriter
implements DeploymentDescriptorWriter

Takes a WSDLHolder and generates a Deployment Descriptor file, which is used when deploying a service on Parvus. The deployment descriptor is named [ClassName]DD.xml. Each PortType becomes a element containing enough information to be used when deploying a service

Method Detail

toDeploymentDescriptor

public SerializedHolder[] toDeploymentDescriptor(WSDLHolder wsdl,
                                                 java.lang.Class classToConvert,
                                                 Options options)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Takes a WSDLHolder and generates a Deployment Descriptor used when deploying a service to a Parvus Service. The name of the Deployment Descriptor is the destinationName+"DD".xml The destinationName is retrieved from the WSDLHolder
Specified by:
toDeploymentDescriptor in interface DeploymentDescriptorWriter
Parameters:
wsdl - The WSDLHolder used for Deployment Descriptor generation
classToConvert - The name of the class used for the deployment descriptor
Returns:
SerializedHolder Encapsulates the byte[] representation of the Deployment Descriptor
